name: Dunk!Dunk Ball
description:
Play extremely attractive basketball on your phone!
Dunk! Dunk Ball: Ball through the Basket is clicking the tapping game, you have to tap and jump to get as much score as possible.A unique basketball game that will drive you mad!Continuously touch the screen to direct the ball through the basket.Do not worry and be patient, you will achieve an unexpected score.

Game features:
- Click on the screen to move the basketball
- Smoothly enter to get higher scores
- Pay attention to time limit
- Smooth music and sound effects
- Get the best record！
